pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, August 5, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

Private meetings.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, Premier of Quebec François Legault, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen, Quebec’s Minister of Families and Minister Responsible for the Outaouais region Mathieu Lacombe, Quebec’s Minister for Transport and Minister Responsible for the Metropolis and the Montréal Region Chantal Rouleau, and Member of Parliament for Hochelaga Soraya Martinez Ferrada will make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

Parc Lalancette
2315, rue Nicolet

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Journalists and photographers who wish to attend the event must register with Mr. Ewan Sauves by sending an email to ewan.sauves@mce.gouv.qc.ca by 7:00 a.m. this Thursday, August 5, 2021.
